law.catch_line: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, on or before January 1, 2005, the Department shall adopt ...

text.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, on or before January 1, 2005, the Department shall adopt regulations to carry out the provisions of this subtitle.

The Department of State Police, in consultation with the Department, shall adopt a regulation or a part of a regulation to enforce compliance by a facility with the hazardous material security standards adopted under this subtitle.
